name: Verify transitions handles requests for unsupported power transitions on NodeBMCs
fullName: api.4-build-pipeline-only.test_transitions_negative.tavern#Verify transitions handles requests for unsupported power transitions on NodeBMCs

steps.name: Stage 0: Retrieve a NodeBMC from HSM to be used in later stages
Stage 1: Attempt a transition to power the target NodeBMC on
Stage 2: Poll until the on transition operation has completed
Stage 3: Retrieve the completed on transition data
